ComicInfo.Title: The Ugly Duckling; Reincarnation; Lottery; The Skeptic!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Ugly Duckling: Jed Barnes had an accident that left his face so disfigured that he would have to wear bandages the rest of his life. When he saved Ruth from committing suicide, she married him, but eventually she wanted to see what was behind the bandages...
Reincarnation: A two-bit thief discovers a scientist that has invented a machine that performs re-incarnation, but he discovers that being someone else isn't all it's cracked up to be...
Lottery: Explorers to the middle of the earth find a civilization that is far advanced from ours. However, the lottery that they hold isn't something that you would want to win...
The Skeptic!: American soldiers come across an abandoned house somewhere in Europe during World War II.
